attributes.action: Offer an alternative option for students who want exams to take place
attributes.additional_details: Because lots more people work harder for their actual GCSE and get better grades in their GCSE exams much higher than their predicted grades.Offering an alternative option will help the students who think they can achieve better in their exams in comparison to getting predicted grades.It is also more fairer since students who didn’t want the exams to get cancelled can get what they want too as it is going to effect their future massively.
attributes.background: I want you to offer an alternative option to the students who want to have GCSE exams take place

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Give students the option to take exams or receive assessed grades for 2020/21: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559964

Offer GCSE and A level students the option to sit their exams at a later date: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/567743
